articles.author: Steven Morris
articles.title: ‘The empire strikes back’: lauded Australian show begins European tour - The Guardian
articles.description: Songlines: Tracking the Seven Sisters, featuring Indigenous cultural works, comes to Plymouth
articles.content:
Indigenous artSonglines: Tracking the Seven Sisters, featuring Indigenous cultural works, opens in Plymouth
On one level, it is a vivid treat for the eye: astonishing bursts of reds, oranges, yellow… [+4051 chars]
